content: Wasn't there a tool that would take your rust code and would remove all dependencies by pasting their code into a file? I remembered someone minimizing code using it

I remember a tool pnkfelix mentioned a while ago
(looking for that ...)

Also, this guide from pnkfelix
https://blog.pnkfx.org/blog/2019/11/18/rust-bug-minimization-patterns/
that is helpful, thanks. but unfortunately, every line I try to remove will "fix" the regression
Have you run standard tools (e.g. creduce, perses?)
